definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Also ridiculous is exasperating, Jiading really have a garden path.
sentences.chinese: 可氣又可笑的是，嘉定還真有一條梅園路。

sentences.english: More what to can annoy BE, Chen Shi not only didn't obstruct, but also Kua Qiao Jean is efficient.
sentences.chinese: 更加可氣的是，沈氏非但沒有阻止，還誇巧珍勤快。

sentences.english: The annoying thing about the scheme is that it's confusing.
sentences.chinese: 這項計劃可氣的地方是它讓人一頭霧水。

sentences.english: Oh, you're very welcome, Amy. What a friend is for?
sentences.chinese: 呵，你太可氣了，艾米。朋友是做什麼用的呢？
